fields.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
fields.notes: Musical. "I would have put it on like a shot if I'd had the opportunity. There would have been screams and yells but I wouldn't have given a damn. Because it is an opera. A modern American opera." - Schuyler Chapin, former general manager of the Metropolitan Opera

fields.title: La Commedia
fields.notes: Multiple language opera. From the Guardian review: "The text combines passages from the original [The Divine Comedy] (in Italian, English and Dutch translations), with extracts from the Old Testament and biblical plays by the 17th-century Dutch writer Joos van den Vondel."
